mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.location_id AS "bizLocation.id", a.cust_id AS "customer.id", o.name AS "customer.name", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", p.id AS "bizLocation.province.id", p.name AS "bizLocation.province.name", city.id AS "bizLocation.city.id", city.name AS "bizLocation.city.name", r.id AS "bizLocation.region.id", r.name AS "bizLocation.region.name", common.address AS "bizLocation.address"

LEFT JOIN common_location common on common.id = a.location_id LEFT JOIN sys_region p on p.id = common.province_id LEFT JOIN sys_region city on city.id = common.city_id LEFT JOIN sys_region r on r.id = common.region_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON a.cust_id = o.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.cust_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_inventory_info( id, name, description, location_id, cust_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{bizLocation.id}, #{customer.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_inventory_info SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, location_id = #{bizLocation.id}, cust_id = #{customer.id}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
